name: Panda & Friends Adventure 2.0
description:
'Panda and friends out for adventure' is Unique concept game for kids. In this game, A Panda and its friends need to sleep in the night, so can you help them? Oh..they are hungry, you have to feed them. Toys are messed up in the room so you have to put those toys properly. After completing all these activities, Panda & Its friends can sleep. This game also includes some mini games. So play this user-friendly game to have more fun and learn different activities by performing by yourself. This panda & its friends will give you so much enjoyment for hours.


Feature:
Save little panda from mosquitos
Available different types of toys
Collection of activities that you perform before panda sleep
Play rhymes with a different musical instrument
Enjoy campfire
Easy to play
